q1.question: How do I upload game videos?
q1.answer: Go to the 'New Post' page and select video files to upload. Supported formats are MP4. The maximum file size is 200MB.

q2.question: Can I edit my posts after uploading?
q2.answer: Currently, you can only delete posts. Post editing feature will be added in future updates.

q3.question: How do I change my profile information?
q3.answer: Go to 'Edit Profile' from the menu to change your username, bio, and profile picture.

q4.question: What should I do if I forgot my password?
q4.answer: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page to reset your password via email verification.

q5.question: How do I report inappropriate content?
q5.answer: Click the menu button (⋮) on any post and select 'Report'. We will review reported content promptly.

section1.title: 1. Purpose of Personal Information Processing
section1.content: SingingBird (hereinafter "Company") processes personal information for the following purposes. The personal information being processed will not be used for any other purposes, and if the purpose of use changes, necessary measures such as obtaining separate consent will be implemented in accordance with Article 18 of the Personal Information Protection Act.
items: Member registration and management
Providing content upload and sharing services for game videos, photos, etc.
Providing social networking features (follow, like, comment)
Providing personalized content recommendations and customized services
Community management and prevention of fraudulent use
Customer support and service improvement
Response to violations of laws and terms of service

section2.title: 2. Personal Information Items Collected
section2.content: The Company collects the following personal information:

required.title: ▶ Required Collection Items
items: Email address, password, username

optional.title: ▶ Optional Collection Items
items: Profile picture, self-introduction

generated.title: ▶ Information Generated During Service Use
items: Uploaded game videos, photos and related metadata
Activity records such as comments, likes, follows
Service usage records, access logs, cookies, access IP information

section3.title: 3. Personal Information Collection Methods
section3.content: The Company collects personal information through the following methods:
items: Information directly provided by users during registration and service use
Information received from relevant platforms when using social login services
Information automatically generated and collected during service use
Information collected during consultation through customer service

section4.title: 4. Personal Information Processing and Retention Period
section4.content: The Company processes and retains personal information within the retention and use period of personal information according to laws or the retention and use period of personal information agreed upon when collecting personal information from data subjects.
items: Member information: Until membership withdrawal (except for legal retention obligations)
Posts and comments: Until deleted by user or membership withdrawal
Service usage records: 3 months
Records related to fraudulent use and disputes: 1 year
When preservation is required by relevant laws: Period specified by the relevant laws

section5.title: 5. Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties
section5.content: The Company does not provide users' personal information to third parties in principle. However, exceptions are made in the following cases:
items: When users have given prior consent
Information disclosed to other users due to service characteristics (profile, posts, etc.)
When required by law or by investigative agencies according to procedures and methods set by law for investigative purposes

section6.title: 6. Measures to Ensure Personal Information Security
section6.content: The Company takes the following measures to ensure the security of personal information:
items: Minimization and training of personal information handling staff
Restricting access to personal information
Use of encryption technology to safely store and transmit personal information
Building security systems to prevent personal information leakage and damage from hacking or computer viruses
Maintaining and preventing forgery of personal information processing system access records

section7.title: 7. Cookies and Automatic Collection Tools
section7.content: The Company uses cookies to improve services and provide customized services:
items: Cookie collection purpose: Maintaining login status, service usage analysis, providing customized content
How to refuse cookie settings: You can refuse cookie storage through browser settings
When cookies are refused: There may be restrictions on using some services that require login

section8.title: 8. Protection of Minor's Personal Information
section8.content: The Company pays special attention to protecting the personal information of children under 14 years of age:
items: Legal guardian consent required for registration of children under 14
Minor's personal information is managed more strictly
Measures to prevent exposure of inappropriate content to minors

section9.title: 9. Rights and Obligations of Data Subjects and How to Exercise Them
section9.content: Data subjects can exercise the following personal information protection-related rights against the Company at any time:
items: Request to view personal information
Request for correction in case of errors
Request for deletion
Request to stop processing
section9.footer: Rights can be exercised through the settings menu in the service or in writing, by phone, or email to the personal information protection officer, and the Company will take action without delay.

section10.title: 10. Personal Information Protection Officer
section10.content: The Company has designated a personal information protection officer as follows to take overall responsibility for personal information processing and to handle complaints and damage relief related to personal information processing of data subjects:

section11.title: 11. Changes to Privacy Policy
section11.content: This privacy policy applies from the effective date, and if there are additions, deletions, or corrections to changes according to laws and policies, we will notify you through announcements 7 days before the implementation of the changes.

section1.title: 1. Purpose
section1.content: These terms are intended to define the conditions and procedures for using the poestagram service (hereinafter "Service") provided by SingingBird (hereinafter "Company") and other necessary matters.

section2.title: 2. Effectiveness and Changes of Terms
section2.content: These terms apply to all members who wish to use the Service. The Company may revise these terms within the scope that does not violate related laws such as the Act on the Regulation of Terms and Conditions.

section3.title: 3. Provision of Services
section3.content: The Company provides the following services:
items: Upload and sharing of media content such as game videos and photos
Social networking with other users (follow, like, comment)
User profile management and personalization services
Content search and recommendation services
Other services additionally developed by the Company or provided through partnerships

section4.title: 4. Service Usage Rules
section4.content: Members must not engage in the following acts:
items: Acts that violate laws or terms
Acts that interfere with normal service operation
Acts of collecting, storing, or disclosing other members' personal information
Acts of unauthorized copying or distribution of others' content
Uploading false information or manipulated content
Using automated programs for service use
Posting unauthorized commercial advertisements
Providing inappropriate content to minors
Acts that infringe on the Company's intellectual property rights

section5.title: 5. Service Suspension
section5.content: The Company may suspend service provision in the following cases:
items: In case of system inspection, maintenance, replacement, etc.
In case of force majeure such as natural disasters, wars, or service suspension by telecommunications service providers

section6.title: 6. Member Obligations
section6.content: Members must comply with the following:
items: Provide accurate information when applying for membership
Immediately register changes when member information changes
Comply with related laws and terms when using the service

section7.title: 7. Content Policy
section7.content: Content uploaded by members must comply with the following standards:
items: Obligation to comply with copyright of uploaded content such as game videos and photos
Prohibition of content that infringes on others' intellectual property rights
Prohibition of inappropriate content such as pornography, violent content, hate speech
Compliance with game company guidelines (for game videos)
Prohibition of uploading content containing personal information

section8.title: 8. Content License
section8.content: Regarding content uploaded by members to the service:
items: Members retain ownership of the content
The Company may use content for service provision, improvement, and promotion purposes
Related licenses terminate when content is deleted
Members bear all legal responsibility for content

section9.title: 9. Community Guidelines
section9.content: When using social features, the following must be observed:
items: Maintain courtesy and respect when interacting through comments, likes, etc.
Prohibition of spam and advertising comments
Prohibition of cyberbullying, harassment, and threats
Prohibition of unauthorized disclosure of others' personal information
Creating a healthy and constructive communication culture

section10.title: 10. Reporting and Sanctions
items: Members can report issues through the reporting function
The Company may take measures such as warnings, content deletion, account suspension/deletion for violations
Appeal procedures are provided for disciplinary measures
Immediate account deletion measures are possible for serious violations

section11.title: 11. Personal Information Protection
items: Profile information, posts, activity records, etc. are collected and used
The scope of information sharing with other users follows the privacy policy
Related data is deleted after a certain period when accounts are deleted
Please refer to the separate privacy policy for details

section12.title: 12. Minor Protection
items: Legal guardian consent is required for those under 14 years of age
Harmful content targeting minors is restricted
Minor's personal information is specially protected
Immediate action is taken when minor-related issues occur
